short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly see relationship status with color coded borders across ùïè / Twitter. Hide tweets based on relationship.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Profile pictures (PFPs) are augmented with color coded borders across X / Twitter - using a simple color code which you will get accustomed to very quickly:

Green = You follow each other
Blue = Account which follows you but you don't follow back
Red = An account that does not follow you back

PRO includes: 
- Hide tweets from
- Display follower count under pfps
